ModMetaData.name: Dog Apparel
ModMetaData.description: This mods adds more features to dogs on the Rim. The theme of the mod is to have dogs play a more important role in your colony. For example; assist disabled pawns with support dogs, spot bombs with K9 military dogs and solve mysteries with Dogtectives, this includes support-dogs and/or assistant,- service dogs and guide dogs. There is also support for 11 dogs from Vanilla Animals Expanded https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2871933948.
